workflowTasks.name: Copy the Demo app to Staging VM

inputs.script:
pm2 stop all
pm2 delete all
sudo pkill -9 pm2
sleep 30;
sudo rm -R /home/unbreakablepipeline/dynatrace
sudo mkdir /home/unbreakablepipeline/dynatrace
sudo chmod -R 777 /home/unbreakablepipeline/dynatrace
cp -R $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)/_UnbreakablePipelineDemo-CI/app /home/unbreakablepipeline/dynatrace
cp $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)/_UnbreakablePipelineDemo-CI/app/start_loadtest.sh /home/unbreakablepipeline/dynatrace
sudo chmod 777 /home/unbreakablepipeline/dynatrace/app/app.js
sudo chmod 777 /home/unbreakablepipeline/dynatrace/start_loadtest.sh

workflowTasks.name: Run Load test against the app
Copy the Demo app to Production VM

inputs.script:
pm2 stop all
pm2 delete all
sudo pkill -9 pm2
sleep 30;
sudo rm -R /home/unbreakablepipeline/dynatrace
sudo mkdir /home/unbreakablepipeline/dynatrace
sudo chmod -R 777 /home/unbreakablepipeline/dynatrace
cp -R $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)/_UnbreakablePipelineDemo-CI/app /home/unbreakablepipeline/dynatrace
cp $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)/_UnbreakablePipelineDemo-CI/app/start_loadtest.sh /home/unbreakablepipeline/dynatrace
sudo chmod 777 /home/unbreakablepipeline/dynatrace/app/app.js
sudo chmod 777 /home/unbreakablepipeline/dynatrace/start_loadtest.sh

workflowTasks.name: Run Load test against the app

defaultVersionType.name: Specify at the time of release creation
